szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.intrfc.arena.proxies

Interface ActorGameInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ActorManagerBasic, ActorManagerUpdatable, GameLevelBasic, GameLevelUpdatable, PlayerGameInterface, PlayerManagerBasic, PlayerManagerUpdatable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActorGameProxy

    public interface ActorGameInterface
extends PlayerGameInterface, ActorManagerUpdatable, PlayerManagerUpdatable, GameLevelUpdatable
    The interface to the game exposed to game actors This interface shall serve as a proxy object for the actors to access the game functionality for practical reasons (accessing functionality through a single object, as opposed to handling multiple separate objects). Although unlike the PlayerGameInterface, security (not allowing access to any methods which could be regarded as cheating) is not a concern here, this interface does not include "privileged" level methods, such as update(), just to remind programmers who want to add new game actors not to think of using said methods (basically, this interface serves as a programmer contract).

    • Method Summary
